abstract: Sheriff Charles L Korzenborn of Covington, Ky, says school resource officer Deputy Kevin Sumner acted appropriately when he handcuffed 8-year-old boy at school; incident was caught on video and led to American Civil Liberties Union lawsuit against sheriff's office and Summer.
lead_paragraph: The county sheriff in Covington on Tuesday defended a school resource officer who was shown on a video restraining an 8-year-old boy with handcuffs last year.

headline.main: Kentucky: Sheriff Defends Officer Shown Handcuffing Child in Video
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Sheriff Defends Officer Shown Handcuffing Child in Video

snippet: The county sheriff in Covington on Tuesday defended a school resource officer who was shown on a video restraining an 8-year-old boy with handcuffs last year.
